Summary Note:
The RM is Maja Emma Krämer's brother-in-law, having married her's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Maja Emma Krämer is a 65 year old retired Editor from Austria.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Maja Emma Krämer is currently divorced. She has 2 kids called Schwarz and Müller.
Education Background:
Maja obtained her secondary school diploma from Lycée Français de Vienne in 1979.
Maja earned her degree from University of Innsbruck in 1983.
Occupation History:
Maja Emma Krämer is a 65 year old retired Editor from Austria. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Maja Emma Krämer launched her career as a Journalist at News Networld Media GmbH, where she gained valuable experience from 1984 to 1986.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Editor at Styria Medien AG in 1988, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 520000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Amstetten, Baden bei Wien and Graz, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Maja as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
